channel.title: Strange error when I run my server
channel.description:
[code]Fallen is Online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "0 .05" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2043) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:547) at server.main(server.java:110) [/code]
What's wrong?
I think this is what's wrong, but I don't know.
[code]if ((GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 1) == true) || (GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 8) == true) && (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2743) || (GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 8) == true) && (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) || (GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 8) == true) && (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2631)) { if (npcs[NPCID].actionTimer == 0) { if (false && (EnemyHP <= (int) ((double) ((double) EnemyMaxHP / 10.0) + 0.5))) { } else {[/code]

item.title: Strange error when I run my server
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You need to ‘un word wrap’ it.

Read full topic

item.title: Strange error when I run my server
item.dc:creator: @Sp_Santa Sp Santa
item.description:
@Sp_Santa wrote:

press ctrl + g in ur npchandler and then typ 547.
U will get on line 547 then, there’s ur error. On that line… On line 2043 u got one too, show us the lines plz

@OwnageDBOW wrote:

Fallen is Online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "0 .05" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2043) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:547) at server.main(server.java:110)

What’s wrong?

I think this is what’s wrong, but I don’t know.

if ((GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 1) == true) || (GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 8) == true) && (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2743) || (GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 8) == true) && (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) || (GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 8) == true) && (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2631)) { if (npcs[NPCID].actionTimer == 0) { if (false && (EnemyHP <= (int) ((double) ((double) EnemyMaxHP / 10.0) + 0.5))) { } else {
